pages.text: You can find Nickel Ore in the Plains biome at within the +45 to +65 altitude. $(br2) Mineable with $(l)$(4)Iron mining level$() Tools: $(li)Iron Pickaxe $(li)Diamond Pickaxe $(li)Netherite Pickaxe $(li)Platinum Pickaxe $(li)Osmium Pickaxe $(li)All Paxels.

You can find Deepslate Nickel Ore in the Plains biome at within the -64 to +8 altitude. $(br2) Mineable with $(l)$(4)Iron mining level$() Tools: $(li)Iron Pickaxe $(li)Diamond Pickaxe $(li)Netherite Pickaxe $(li)Platinum Pickaxe $(li)Osmium Pickaxe $(li)All Paxels.
